body.name: ROCCAT Torch USB Microphone, Studio-Grade Audio, PC Computer Gaming Wired Mic, RGB AIMO Lighting with Indicator, For Streaming, Recording, Podcasting, Quick Mute, Boom Arm Compatible, Black
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: $11 delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs
features: STUDIO-GRADE AUDIO - 24-Bit audio with up to 48kHz sampling ensure you reliably sound how you're supposed to; Your quietest whisper to your loudest roar – all delivered crisply and clearly
MIXER-STYLE CONTROLS - Cycle pickup patterns or adjust volume and gain on the fly with professional mixer-style controls; Includes audio pass-through functionality to make fine tuning a breeze
THREE PICK-UP PATTERNS - Featuring Cardioid, Stereo and the exclusive Whisper pick-up pattern, the Torch has everything you need to game, create or broadcast in any setting

CONTACTLESS QUICK-MUTE - The gesture activated mute functionality provides a quick, convenient way to instantly mute; The RGB lighting and handy indicator on the base shows you when you're muted or live
REACTIVE LIGHTING - 3 distinct RGB lighting zones change colour depending on the pattern selected or mode the Torch is in; They also act as a visual indicator helping you fine tune the gain
BOOM ARM COMPATIBLE - The Torch adapts to your needs; It can be separated from its base and attached to a boom arm; In this configuration you can still use the mixer-style controls
body.description: Meet the ROCCAT Torch Studio-Grade USB Microphone. Designed for aspiring creators and gamers alike, the Torch will take you and your content to the next level. 24-Bit audio quality, a dual condenser design, latency free mic monitoring and an integrated pop guard, ensure you always sound immaculate. Featuring three pick-up patterns – Cardioid, Stereo and the exclusive ‘Whisper’, giving you the tools to play, create and broadcast in any setting. Lightning-fast Contactless Quick Mute gives you instant control when it matters most. Compatible with a wide range of accessories such as shock mounts and boom arms, the ROCCAT Torch evolves with your set-up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light your way Meet the ROCCAT Torch Studio-Grade USB Microphone. The dual condenser design, 24-Bit audio quality and three pick-up patterns will take your content to the next level.

Studio-grade Audio 24-Bit audio with up to 48kHz sampling ensure you reliably sound how you're supposed to. Your quietest whisper to your loudest roar – all delivered crisply and clearly. Mixer Style Controls Cycle pickup patterns or adjust volume and gain on the fly with professional mixer-style controls. Includes audio pass-through functionality to make fine tuning a breeze. Contactless Quick-Mute The gesture activated mute functionality provides a quick, convenient way to instantly mute. The RGB lighting & handy indicator on the base shows you when you're muted or live. Cardioid Pick-up Pattern Cardioid is the pick for regular gaming and steaming. It captures your voice directly in front of the microphone, ensuring crisp, clear sound. Whisper Pick-up Pattern Whisper is exclusive to the ROCCAT Torch. Select this pattern for late night gaming and recording sessions. Whisper is perfect for when you need to be at your quietest, but still be heard. Stereo Pick-up Pattern Stereo utilizes both the left and right audio channels. It’s your option if you are looking to capture multiple sound sources, or record vocals, instruments or perhaps ASMR content.

Is the ROCCAT Torch an XLR microphone? No, the ROCCAT Torch is a USB microphone Does the ROCCAT Torch require software to use? No, the ROCCAT Torch is plug and play and doesn’t require software. Is the ROCCAT Torch AIMO compatible? Yes, download the Neon software suite for Windows 10 & 11 PCs to enable AIMO lighting compatibility. roccat.com/downloads. Is the ROCCAT Torch Compatible with 3rd party Boom Arms? Yes. Simply detach the microphone module from its base and attach it to a compatible boom arm. Then connect both the mic module and base unit to your PC using the included cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic, not great software.
reviews.reviewText: So the mic itself is great. Great quality, great features, and the audio quality is really good for the price. Another selling point for me, is I have a deep voice and I have not found a mic that would pick my voice up worth a crap until this one. That being said I haven't tried high end mics, just ones around this price range, and headset mics. The downside is the software. There is no mixing/effects software from roccat. It just allows you to kind of change the colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic for anyone
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Buy this mic. I was looking at several mics, including the XCast versions. This was much cheaper and smaller, but it is a tough cookie. I guarantee you that this will handle 90% of your needs in terms of Zoom or Google meetings (which is what I use it for). It looks odd, but once it's on a boom arm with lights, you will be styling. A boom arm will only improve your sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality, good sounding mic which has a heavy duty construction. The mic can be rotated while it sits in the base which is nice. Volume and gain control is important for a good set up. The colors are nice to touch. It is comparable in sound and quality to the hyperx quad I had and more versatile than the hyperx solo. The difference being that the quad and solo are best arm mounted. The solo has small foot print so i keep it on the arm and this one is the better desk mount option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mic, Gimmicky (but useful) Features
reviews.reviewText: Great mic! Only using this when gaming online with my friends, because I don't like to always have to use a headset to chat. Previously used a Blu Snowball.Have this mounted on a cheapo $15 mic arm I also got from AMZ. Roccat includes the short USB C to USB C cable if you want to use this on the control board and also a longer USB C cable if you want to use it on an arm.Sound quality is good, I would say pretty much on par with the Snowball. Main reason for the switch was to have the easily accessible controls on hand. Controls include a switch that controls the power and pickup pattern, mic volume control with a push to mute, and an onboard gain level. It also has a gimmicky yet useful quick mute on the top of the condenser which if it detects motion above it it will mute/unmute the mic, which has a switch on the back of the control board that allows you to set the sensitivity level of the motion that triggers it. Also on the rear of the control board is the RGB switch, and a 3.5mm headphone jack used for mic monitoring.Another cool thing about the control board is it notifies you if the mic is live by showing you a lit up LIVE led on the front of the board. If the mic is muted it shows a red led mic off light. The mic itself also color codes the pickup mode.One thing to note, when you initially install the mic to the PC it may not be detected if you have the audio pick up setting to the default option. Switching it to carboid, stereo, or whisper mode may solve that issue.Overall a great mic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible deal used.
reviews.reviewText: I had picked this up for around 45-46$ used. It didnt have the original box, but it came with everything it needed. All of the cables and of course the microphone itself.for 99$ I am aware this condenser mic is a steal, but used in fantastic quality, this is probably the best boom mic you can buy as of this review. I've yet to mount it onto an arm and once I do, it'll further prove itself as one of the greatest budget boom mics you can ever own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Microphone I Needed:
reviews.reviewText: I was paranoid once my ancient snowball died. Now though I have a microphone I can mute with a touch, change my volume manually when I get too loud, and a with my headset plugged in; a volume dial to tune down everything. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for home recording podcast YouTube
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this as a replacement for snow ball speaker as I needed something that recorded in stereo. Really impressed and like the touch less mute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Facil de configurar y adaptar al requerimiento de cada uno , de buen material y buenas terminaciones.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ich Würde es gerne wieder zurück geben!
reviews.reviewText: 100€ für ein halbes Jahr Spaß?! Der Klang war in Ordnung nur leider jetzt nach einem halben Jahr möchte es nichts mehr. Es verbindet sich nicht mehr mit der Station. Fehler konnte von 5Leuten nicht gefunden werden.. ich bin sehr enttäuscht! Wer billig kauft, zahlt doppelt trifft hier leider zu.

reviews.reviewTitle: ROCCAT コンデンサーマイク、Torch USB - ゲーミングマイク、ストリーミング用
reviews.reviewText: ROCCAT Torch USB コンデンサーマイクは、ゲームプレイやストリーミング向けにデザインされたマイクで、個人的な使用経験に基づくレビューをお伝えします。まず、このマイクの最大の特徴は、USB接続による簡単なセットアップと高音質な録音能力です。USB接続なので、専用のオーディオインターフェースや複雑な配線が不要で、手軽に使い始めることができます。録音品質は非常にクリアで、音声が自然に再現されます。特にストリーミングやゲーム実況などの用途に適しており、ユーザーの声を鮮明に伝えることができます。ノイズリダクション機能も搭載されており、外部の雑音を最小限に抑えることができます。デザインは洗練されており、スタイリッシュな外観が魅力です。可動式のマウントと調整可能なアームが付属しており、使い手の好みに合わせて調整が可能です。デスクスペースを有効に活用できるのもポイントです。ROCCAT Torchは、ライティングエフェクトも搭載されており、デスク上に独自の雰囲気を演出します。RGBライティングを好みに合わせてカスタマイズでき、視覚的な楽しさを提供しています。総じて、ROCCAT Torch USB コンデンサーマイクは、ゲームプレイやストリーミング向けに高性能なマイクとしておすすめです。手軽なセットアップ、優れた録音品質、スタイリッシュなデザインが、クリエイターやゲーマーにとって満足度の高い製品となっています。

reviews.reviewTitle: ミュート機能が秀逸、つまみ類は過剰だがガシェッターなら買い
reviews.reviewText: とにかくミュート機能が素晴らしいです。触ってミュートと、普通のミュートボタンの両方があります。触ってミュートはポップノイズがしません。絶対発動させたいときはしたの真ん中のつまみを押してミュートさせることができます。右側のスライダーはマイクのボリュームです。ただこれはソフト制御のインターフェースに過ぎないので期待はずれかな。だいたいマックスにしてます。中央のダイアルつまみはスピーカーの音量です。右側の選択つまみでマイクの指向性を多少変化させることができます。こちらはハード制御みたいです。なんか机の上を豪華にしたい人にうってつけです。地味ですが背面にイヤホン端子あります。
